name: zen-koan
description: A website dedicated to zen koan (story, dialogue, question, or statement)

scripts.build: ./node_modules/.bin/browserify -v -t [ babelify  --presets [es2015 react] ] src/public/main.jsx > public/js/main.js;    ./node_modules/.bin/browserify -v -t [ babelify  --presets [es2015]] src/server/app.js > server/app.js ;

author: Jacob Evans
